articles.description: The actress told Page Six that she wants to “go back and redo everything” on “This Is Us,” as becoming a mom in real life has “changed everything.”
articles.content:
Mandy Moore says becoming a mom has changed everything including how she portrays Rebecca Pearson on This Is Us.
Im like, Oh, it all makes sense now, the actress, 37, exclusively told Page Six at LA… [+2220 chars]

articles.title: Tory Lanez Handcuffed in Court, Violated Protective Order in Megan Thee Stallion Case - TMZ
articles.description: Tory Lanez was handcuffed in court and had his bail increased after a judge ruled he violated the protective order in his case with Meg Thee Stallion for talking about her on social media.
articles.content:
